header.gameNote: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - 1ST ROUND

videos.description: Omer Yurtseven denies Jaron Blossomgame at the rim for the Wolfpack.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (NC State's Yurtseven swats away Clemson's shot) 2017/03/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: NC State's Yurtseven swats away Clemson's shot

videos.description: Clemson's Shelton Mitchell gets the steal and leaves it for Jaron Blossomgame, who throws down the big dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Blossomgame elevates for emphatic slam) 2017/03/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blossomgame elevates for emphatic slam

videos.description: NC State gets a shot blocked leading to a Avry Holmes 3-pointer as Clemson is able to extend its lead to 11 entering the half.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Five-point swing goes Clemson's way before halftime) 2017/03/07 ESHEET
